overview:
Mikko is a technical lead with over 10 years of professional experience in online & mobile services & games and close to 20 years of hobbyist background in real-time computer graphics.

Mikko is the Technical Director and one of the Founders at Grand Cru, a games company founded by six industry veterans in 2011. Grand Cru’s vision is to revolutionize mass-market mobile, tablet and social gaming with user-generated content and synchronous multiplayer.

Strong growth potential, scalable business models, deep user experience and interesting technical challenges have always been driving factors for Mikko. Before Grand Cru he was the Lead Software Architect at Sulake, focusing on scalability and development processes of their flagship product Habbo Hotel.
